name: Solarb Shoot (Fully Created by Me)
description:
Want to destroy ships in a deluxe Java crappy game? Try this out! If you want my source code, ask!

If it doesn't work: https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/downloads/#jdk17-windows

Controls:

  • ← to move left
  • ↑ to move up
  • → to move right
  • ↓ to move down
  • Space to shoot!
